name: Client Identifier
definition: A unique ID given to each client in the system

name: Product Stock Code
definition: Code used to identify items in inventory

name: Transaction Date
definition: Date when a transaction was processed

name: Customer Name
definition: The name of a customer as it appears in records

name: Client Phone
definition: Contact telephone number for the client

name: Order Amount
definition: The total monetary value of an order

name: Email Contact
definition: Email address used for contacting customers

name: Shipping Location
definition: Address where products will be shipped

name: Payment Type
definition: Method used by customer to pay for products
